appStages.name: Introduction
Agreement Analysis
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eLease Agreement Analyzer\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload the lease document, analyze it, and receive clause-wise recommendations in the response box.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Lease Agreement Document",
      "description": "Supports single/multi-page PDFs",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "autofocus": true,
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "fileMinSize": "",
      "multiple": true,
      "key": "uploadFile",
      "properties": {
        "clearFiles": "true"
      },
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "/data/GENAI/Lease-Agreement/Upload",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "properties": {
                "for": "uploadFile"
              },
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 12,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 12
        },
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],

    {

              "tableView": false,
              "key": "submit1",
              "properties": {
                "": "true"
              },

              "input": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Load Document",

              "tableView": false,
